item.title: [Python] Build your own PC for deep learning
item.description: Leave a memorandum of your own PC. Finally, I will describe up to the point where Ubuntu is installed and a deep learning environment is created with docker. table of contents Find out how to make your own PC Assemble the PC Environmental construction 1. Find out how to make your own PC I referred to the following sites. -Summary by budget for own PC -How to make a deep learning PC It seems that it is better to decide the specifications according to the application.
